text: Lekin inn mein say kaamil aur mazboot ilm walay hain aur eman walay hain jo uss per eman latay hain jo aap ki taraf utara gaya hai aur jo aap say pehlay utara gaya aur namzon ko qaeem rakhney walay hain aur zakat kay ada kerney walay hain aur Allah per aur qayamat kay din per eman rakhney walay hain yeh hain jinhen hum boht baray ajar ata farmayen gay
